trial_type.Descripton: An imagined right hand finger tapping task, alternating between blocks of counting backwards and imagined finger tapping. Participant imagines tapping the fingers of their right hand until the end of the task block is reached.

Levels.MentalFingerTapping: A '>' sign is displayed in white in the middle of the screen with a black background.
Levels.Count: A '+' sign is displayed in white in the middle of the screen with a black background.
